testCase.name: handleInputChange should call setInputValue with the event target value
SearchInput should render search input field with default props
SearchInput should update input field when user inputs a search term
SearchInput should update input field when user inputs a search term and isTruncated is true
closeBox should set search results to an empty array
closeBox should set show box state to false
closeBox should handle setSearchResults parameter not being a function
closeBox should handle setShowBox parameter not being a function
closeBox should handle multiple calls in a row
SearchValues should call handleClick when search item is clicked
SearchItem should render a div element with an empty className
SearchItem should render a span element with the specified className when type is "general"
SearchItem should render a div element when item.products.length > 0
SearchItem should render a div element when item is undefined
